attributes.title: Horrible app!!!
attributes.review: Once i downloaded this app, which took FOREVER to download, It was very slow and showed ads. Honestly HORRIBLE customer service. Well it’s donald trump how am i not impressed.

attributes.title: Terrible!!
attributes.review: This app gave my grandfather eyeball and brain cancer 😔 now he can’t see or think. It needs to be removed immediately before it hurts more people!!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: The worst app ever. so many viruses and unnecessary adds. doesn’t even work when you open it! waste of storage and my time.

attributes.title: Useless information
attributes.review: There is nothing here you can’t find anywhere else... the app is useless

attributes.title: WORST APP
attributes.review: this is the WORST APP EVER it literally took days to finally download and just a waste of time, also, the orange musty and wrinkly thing that’s connected to this app is pretty traumatizing to look at. like cmon.. do better.

attributes.title: Trump 2020
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see what is going on but it was glitchy and it made my phone glitch more! I think there is a virus or bug in it :(

attributes.title: Just disgusting I do not recommend 🍊
attributes.review: Child pictures all over the app and henti also! App kept crashing and I can’t delete it! 😭

attributes.title: WORST TASTE EVER!!
attributes.review: as soon as I downloaded this app I got the most revolting taste in my mouth! it was almost like a orange spray tan and hair glue taste and it wouldn’t leave. I would not recommend to anyone ever unless you want to become and orange.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: It doesn’t work properly and it took weeks to download, it also took Up a lot of space

attributes.title: just don’t
attributes.review: this app doesn’t work for me at all !! truly sad i don’t get to learn about how racist and homophobic our PRESIDENT is,, just logs me out of the app and shuts down my phone. what’s a shame.
